title: Cauliflower.
instructions: Remove leaves, cut off stalk, and soak thirty minutes
Sauce Prepare as for Creamed Cauliflower, using Hollandaise
cover brown Place with crumbs; a whole buttered cooked crumbs, cauliflower and place on dish on oven for serving, grate to
cheese Prepare before as Cauliflower covering with au Gratin. Sprinkle with grated
